Summary: Notes API, Get the list of all Notes - Default limit 50 not working
Description:
The limit parameter’s *default* value 50 should work. At the moment it does not show 50 notes by default.

*Steps:*

# Send GET request to url: {{https://cerebrumhubcrmlite.bubbleapps.io/api/1.1/obj/note}}

*Expected result:*

(/) 50 notes are displayed in a list(“count“: 50).

*Actual result:*

(x) All the notes are displayed in a list(“count“: 100).
Creator: Birgit Tikk

Summary: Funnels API, Stages API - no validations in the documentation
Description:
There are no validations about mandatory fields for both Funnels and Stages API. Can’t test certain requests, as it is not clear which fields are mandatory and which are not.

*Steps :*

# Go to the following url: [https://cerebrumhubstudents.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/T12CA/pages/919502979/Funnels+and+Stages+API|https://cerebrumhubstudents.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/T12CA/pages/919502979/Funnels+and+Stages+API|smart-link] 
# Observe that there are no validations for mandatory fields for both Funnels and Stages API

*Expected result:*

(/) There are sections about validations of mandatory fields for both Funnels and Stages API in the documentation.

*Actual result:*

(x) There are no validations for mandatory fields for both Funnels and Stages API in the documentation.
Creator: Birgit Tikk

Summary: Leads API, Get Lead by ID - works with no authorization
Description:
Get Lead by ID - no authorization is required to request the lead by id.

*Precondition:* A lead with unique ID exists

*Steps:*

# Send GET request to url without entering the token: {{https://cerebrumhubcrmlite.bubbleapps.io/api/1.1/obj/lead/:UniqueID}}

*Expected result:*

(/) Error message 401 Unauthorized, no permission to get the lead by id without authorization.

*Actual result:*

(x) Lead’s data is displayed in response, no errors shown.
Creator: Birgit Tikk

Summary: Leads API, Get the list of all Leads - Descending data type integer no error message shown
Description:
GET list of all Leads descending data type integer should show an error of using a wrong data type, should be boolean. System ignores wrong data type, no error message shown and shows list in ascending order.

*Steps:*

# Send GET request to url: {{https://cerebrumhubcrmlite.bubbleapps.io/api/1.1/obj/lead?sort_field=company_text&descending=55}}

*Expected result:*

(/) GET list of all Leads descending data type integer should show 404 Not Found error message about wrong data type.

*Actual result:*

(x) GET list of all Leads descending data type integer works. System ignores wrong data type and shows list in ascending order. No errors shown.
Creator: Birgit Tikk

Summary: Leads API, Get the list of all Leads - Cursor data type boolean no error message shown
Description:
GET list of all Leads cursor data type boolean should show an error of using a wrong data type, should be integer. System ignores wrong data type and shows cursor 0.

*Steps:*

# Send GET request to url: {{https://cerebrumhubcrmlite.bubbleapps.io/api/1.1/obj/lead?cursor=false}}

*Expected result:*

(/) GET list of all Leads cursor data type boolean should show 404 Not Found error message about wrong data type.

*Actual result:*

(x) GET list of all Leads cursor data type boolean works. System ignores wrong data type and shows cursor 0. No errors shown.
Creator: Birgit Tikk

Summary: Leads API, Get the list of all Leads - Cursor data type string no error message shown
Description:
GET list of all Leads cursor data type string should show an error of using a wrong data type, should be integer. System ignores wrong data type and shows cursor 0.

*Steps:*

# Send GET request to url: {{https://cerebrumhubcrmlite.bubbleapps.io/api/1.1/obj/lead?cursor=asdghfjk53ndja6}}

*Expected result:*

Summary: Leads API, Get the list of all Leads - Limit data type string no error message shown
Description:
GET list of all Leads limit data type string should show an error of using a wrong data type, as it should be integer. System ignores wrong data type and shows all Leads max count 100.

*Steps:*

# Send GET request to url: {{https://cerebrumhubcrmlite.bubbleapps.io/api/1.1/obj/lead?limit=GreetingHumans}}

*Expected result:*

(/) GET list of all Leads limit data type string should show 404 Not Found error message about wrong data type.

*Actual result:*

(x) GET list of all Leads limit data type string works. System ignores wrong data type and shows all Leads max count 100. No errors shown.
Creator: Birgit Tikk
